content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice task.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun to play and short :)

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice idea and all is ok

Goal
* Please format "b", "r", "g" and "y" as {{constants}}.

* Please do not format "=10" and "=rgy" as part of a variable.

Input
* Please change "[[n]] : {{int}}" to "<<Line 1>>: An integer [[n]] for the".

* Similar change for Line 2.

("int" and "string" should not be formatted as constants. Also the full word "integer" should be written.)

Constraints
* Please delete the current "constraint". Instead, you may state that [[c]] consists of characters in {{brgy}} only.

* Suggest to add "1 ≤ [[n]] ≤ 1000" as the first constraint.

Cases
* Suggest to modify variable [[c]] in validators a bit more, while still being similar to the corresponding tests. For example, the second validator may test another colour instead of blue, and the last validator may test a different colour ordering. Similar changes to other validators as well.

* You may consider relaxing the upper limit of length of [[c]] and adding cases where there are repeating colours in the basic pattern, e.g. rgrbry.

Thanks.
Thanks for the feedback, changes have been made as per requested.
